summary: Marine inspections help the Coast Guard ensure that ships are following safety, security, and environmental laws. To address its long-standing challenges in employing enough experienced marine inspectors, the Coast Guard has initiatives underway, including hiring, improving training, and acquiring technology to expedite inspections. But the demand for inspections has consistently exceeded the supply of inspectors. We recommended ways to better predict—and meet—the Coast Guard's inspector...
title: Coast Guard: Enhancements Needed to Strengthen Marine Inspection Workforce Planning Efforts
